item.title: CVE-2023-1873|2023-04-17T13:06:28.532Z -- faturamatik -- bircard
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Faturamatik Bircard allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Bircard: before 23.04.05.
